ygData.subject: Re: Boat Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Embedded here is the key flaw.  Getting the attention and help of someone from Verant is too hard and takes too long.  I understand that they have a
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:18 PM 6/26/99 -0700, Jack Naugle wrote:
>2 whole days of what I did not consider very fun.

Embedded here is the key flaw. Getting the attention and help of someone
from Verant is too hard and takes too long. I understand that they have a
problem with staff versus the number of players, and I have no doubt that
far too many of player attempts to get attention deserve a quick brush off
to play the game rather than look to officials for hints and in-game help.

Nevertheless, they are not doing a very good job of helping people with
legitimate problems that, as in your case, lead to hours or days of being
unable to play. Verant needs to find a way to get communication and
legitimate help flowing back to the players.

Bob
